channel.title: [PI] PvP Glitch
channel.description: In PvP when you use the chop or slash action you recieve not only melee EXP but also Range EXP, could someone please tell me which file this would be located in? I have been searching for hours and I thought I found something in combatassistant, but it ended up not working. Please help

item.title: [PI] PvP Glitch
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
